alert.note: Alert for Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 1:47PM MST until January 14 at 7:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 8 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Tripp County. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 8 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop late Friday afternoon with areas of reduced visibility in snow and blowing snow possible through Friday evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
